html:
<head>

	
	
	
	

	
	
		
	
	
		
			
			
			
				
					
					
					
				
			
		
	
	
		 
	
	
		Archive for  
	
	
		
	
	
		Page Not Found
	

	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	{ "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "WebSite", "url": "", "potentialAction": { "@type": "SearchAction", "target": "?q={search_term}", "query-input": "required name=search_term" } }

	

	
		
		
		
		
	

	
	
		
		
			
			
			
			
			        
			
			
			
			        
		
		
		
		  
		
		
		
			
			
			
			
			
			  
			
		
		
		
		
		     
	

	
	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	 
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	
	
	
	
	

	

		/* Variable definitions
		====================
		<Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#343535" value="#343535"/>

		<Group description="Backgrounds" selector="body">
			<Variable name="body.background.color" description="Outer Background" type="color" default="#d8dcde" value="#d8dcde"/>
		</Group>

		<Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/>	

		<Group description="Page Text" selector="body">
			<Variable name="body.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/>
		</Group>

		<Group description="Links" selector="body">
			<Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#0089ff" value="#0089ff"/>
			<Variable name="link.visited.color" description="Visited Color" type="color" default="#969696" value="#969696"/>
			<Variable name="link.hover.color" description="Hover Color" type="color" default="#41bd33" value="#41bd33"/>
		</Group>

		<Group description="Header" selector="header">
			<Variable name="header.background.color" description="Background Header" type="color" default="#00BCD4" value="#00bbd4"/>	
		</Group>	

		<Group description="Sidebar" selector="#website-sidebar">
			<Variable name="sidebar.background.color" description="Background Sidebar" type="color" default="#1f2331" value="#1f2331"/>
		</Group>

		<Group description="Footer" selector="footer">
			<Variable name="footer.background.color" description="Background Footer" type="color" default="#1c2227" value="#1c2227"/>
		</Group>				
		*/

		/**
		*
		* css-layout
		*
		*/

		#layout {
		min-width: 0;
		}
		#layout #website-header {
		min-width: 0;
		width: 100%;
		height:200px;
		position:relative;
		}
		#layout #website-header-1 {
		width:45%;
		float:left;
		}
		#layout #website-navbar {
		width:45%;
		float:right;
		}
		#layout #container {
		padding-top:0;
		}
		#layout #website-main {
		width:70%;
		float:left;
		}
		#layout #website-sidebar {
		width:30%;
		float:right;
		}
		#layout #website-footer {
		clear:both;
		width:auto;
		}
		#layout .website-footer-widget .website-footer {
		width: 27%;
		float: left;
		}
		#layout #website-footer-1 {
		margin:0 20px 0 0;
		}			
		#layout #website-footer-3 {
		float:right;
		}		 


		/**
		*
		* css-fix
		* rewrite with love
		*/

		.clear {clear:both}
		#navbar-iframe{height:0;visibility:hidden;display:none}
		html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,table,caption,tbody,tfoot,thead,tr,th,td,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline;font-family: "HelveticaNeue-Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Lucida Grande", sans-serif} 
		.widget, .section {margin:0;}
		.widget li{padding:0}
		.widget ul{padding:0;margin:0;line-height:normal}
		.widget-content li {list-style-type:none;}
		a img {border-width: 0}
		img {max-width:100%;vertical-align:middle;border:0;height: auto}
		b{font-weight: 700}
		acronym {border=bottom:1px dotted;cursor:help}
		i{font-style:italic;}
		h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{margin:0;padding:0;display:block;font-weight: 700}
		h1 {font-size: 150%}
		h2 {font-size: 140%}
		h3 {font-size: 130%}
		h4 {font-size: 120%}
		h5 {font-size: 110%}
		.quickedit,.blog-feeds,.post-feeds{display:none}
		.hidden{visibility:hidden:height:0;overflow:hidden;display:none}

		/**
		*
		* css-basic
		*
		*/

		body {
		background: $(body.background);
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		color: $(body.text.color);
		font-size:16px;		
		text-align: left;
		}
		a:link {
		color: $(link.color);
		text-decoration: none;
		margin-left: 0;
		margin-right: 0;
		-webkit-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-moz-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-ms-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-o-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		}
		a:visited {
		color: $(link.visited.color);
		text-decoration: none;
		margin-left: 0;
		margin-right: 0;
		}
		a:hover {
		color: $(link.hover.color);
		}

		/**
		*
		* css-bootstrap
		*
		*/

		.container {
		padding-right: 15px;
		padding-left: 15px;
		margin-right: auto;
		margin-left: auto;
		}
		@media (min-width: 768px) {
		.container {
		width: 750px;
		}
		}
		@media (min-width: 992px) {
		.container {
		width: 970px;
		}
		}
		@media (min-width: 1200px) {
		.container {
		width: 970px;
		}
		}	 


		/**
		*
		* css-header
		* made with love
		*/

		header {
		width: 100%;
		overflow: hidden;
		position: fixed;
		top: 0;
		left: 0;
		z-index: 2;
		background: $(header.background.color);
		transition:height 0.3s ;			
		}
		header h1.website-title {
		display: inline-block;
		line-height:120px;
		float: left;
		font-size: 40px;
		color: #fcfcfc;
		-webkit-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-moz-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-ms-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		-o-transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		transition: ease-in-out 0.3s;
		}
		header h1.website-title a{
		color: #fcfcfc;
		transition:none;
		}
		header nav {
		display: inline-block;
		float: right;
		}
		header nav a {
		line-height: 120px;
		margin-left: 20px !important;
		font-size: 1em;
		font-weight:bold;
		}
		header.small {
		height:50px;
		}
		header.small h1.website-title {
		height:50px;
		line-height: 50px;
		font-size: 30px;
		margin: 0;
		}
		header.small nav a {
		line-height: 50px;
		}

		/**
		*
		* css-header-responsive
		*
		*/

		@media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
		header {
		width: 100%;
		overflow: hidden;
		position: static;			
		}		
		header h1.website-title {
		display:block;
		float:none;
		margin:0 auto;
		line-height: 50px;
		text-align: center;
		font-size:25px;
		}
		header nav {
		display:block;
		float:none;
		height:auto;
		text-align:center;
		margin: 0 auto;
		}
		header nav a {
		line-height: 1.5;
		margin: 0 10px !important;
		font-size:14px;
		}
		header.small {
		height:90px;
		}
		header.small h1.website-title {
		height:40px;
		line-height: 40px;
		width:100%;
		}
		header.small nav {
		height: 35px;
		}
		header.small nav a{
		line-height: 1.5;
		}
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
		header {
		position: fixed;			
		}			
		header h1.website-title {
		display: inline-block;
		line-height:120px;
		float: left;
		font-size: 40px;
		color: #fcfcfc;
		}
		header nav {
		display: inline-block;
		float: right;
		}
		header nav a {
		line-height: 120px;
		margin-left: 20px !important;
		font-size: 1em;
		font-weight:bold;
		}
		header.small {
		height:50px;
		}
		header.small h1.website-title {
		width:auto;
		height:50px;
		line-height: 50px;
		font-size: 30px;
		margin: 0;
		}
		header.small nav a {
		line-height: 50px;
		}

		} 		

		/**
		*
		* css-navbar
		*
		*/


		/**
		*
		* css-main
		*
		*/

		#container {
		padding-top: 20px;
		overflow:hidde;
		}


		/**
		*
		* css-article
		*
		*/

		.blog-posts {
		display:inline-block;
		}
		.website-article-box {
		position:relative;
		}
		.website-thumbnail {
		width:100%;
		height:180px;;
		overflow:hidden;	
		background:#000;		
		-webkit-transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		transition: .3s ease-in-out;		
		}
		.website-thumbnail img {
		width:100%;
		height:auto;
		opacity: 0.5;
		}
		.post:hover .website-thumbnail{
		width: 125%;		
		}
		.website-article-title {
		position:absolute;
		bottom:0;
		left:0;
		right:0;
		padding:15px;
		background:rgba(31, 35, 49, 0.80);
		}
		.website-article-title a{
		color:#fff;
		font-size:20px;
		}
		.website-article-title a:visited {
		color:$(link.visited.color);
		}			
		.post:hover .website-article-title a {
		color:$(link.hover.color);
		}				
		.website-article-title a:before {
		content:"";
		position:absolute;
		left:0;
		top:0;
		width:100%;
		height:100%;
		}
		.website-article-date {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		right:0;
		padding:15px;
		color:#fff;
		font-size:12px;
		transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		}		
		.post:hover .website-article-date, .post:hover .website-article-label  {	
		opacity:1;
		}		
		.website-article-label {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		left:0;
		padding:15px;
		font-size:12px;
		transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		}
		.website-article-label a {
		color:#fff;
		}
		.website-article-info {
		padding:10px 20px 30px;
		line-height:1.5;
		}
		.post {
		box-shadow:0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.16), 0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23);
		overflow:hidden;
		}

		/**
		*
		* css-article-item
		*
		*/
		.post-item {		
		line-height:1.5;
		border:1px solid #fff;
		border-top:none;
		padding:20px;
		margin:0 25px 20px 0;
		}
		.post-item img {
		max-width: 100%; 
		display:block; 
		height: auto;		 
		}
		.post-item iframe {
		max-width:100%;
		max-height:100%;
		}
		.website-article-item-title {
		padding:10px 0;
		border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;
		text-transform:uppercase;
		}

		/**
		*css-article
		* css-article-item
		*
		*/

		.post, .post-item {
		background:#fff;
		}		 					


		/**
		*
		* css-sidebar
		*
		*/		

		.website-sidebar .widget > h3 {
		padding:10px;
		position:relative;
		background:rgba(0,0,0,0.20);
		color:#fcfcfc;
		}
		.website-sidebar .widget > h3:before {
		font-family:fontawesome;
		position:absolute;
		right:0;
		top:0;		
		content:'\f09e';
		padding:12px 15px;
		border-left:1px solid #333;
		color:#ffc107;
		}
		.website-sidebar .widget-content {
		padding:10px;
		border:1px solid #333;
		overflow:hidden;
		}
		.website-sidebar .widget {
		margin-bottom:10px;
		box-shadow:0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.16), 0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23);
		background:$(sidebar.background.color);
		color:#fff;
		}

		/**
		*
		* css-main-responsive
		* css-sidebar-responsive
		*/

		@media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
		#container {
		padding-top:20px;
		}
		#website-main, #website-sidebar, .website-article {
		float:none;
		width:100%;
		}
		.website-article {
		margin:0 25px 20px 0;
		}
		.website-article-info {
		height:100px;
		}
		.website-article-label,.website-article-date {
		opacity:1;
		}
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
		.website-article {		
		width:calc(50% - 25px);
		float:left;
		}		
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
		#website-main {
		float:left;
		width:70%;
		}			
		.website-article-info {
		height:100px;
		}	
		.website-article-label,.website-article-date {
		opacity:0;
		}			
		#website-sidebar {
		float:right;
		width:30%;
		}			
		}	
		@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
		#container {
		padding-top:150px;
		}
		.website-article-info {
		height:80px;
		}		
		}


		/**
		*
		* css-comments
		*
		*/
		#comments {
		padding:20px;
		background:#fff;
		margin:0 25px 20px 0;
		}		


		/**
		*
		* css-footer
		* made with love
		*/

		#website-footer {
		background: $(footer.background.color);
		margin-top:10px;
		}
		.website-footer-widget {
		line-height:20px;
		overflow:hidden;
		}
		#website-footer-1 {
		margin:0 20px 0 0;
		}		
		#website-footer-2 {
		}		
		#website-footer-3 {
		float:right;
		}						
		.website-footer .widget {

		}		
		.website-footer .widget > h3 {
		background:$(footer.background.color);
		padding:15px 0 15px 25px;
		border-bottom: 2px solid #fff;
		color:#fcfcfc;
		position:relative;				
		}
		.website-footer .widget > h3:before {
		width:50%;		
		padding:15px 0;
		border-bottom: 2px solid #2196f3;
		color:#fcfcfc;
		position:absolute;
		left:0;
		top:0;				
		content:'\f09e';
		font-family:fontawesome;
		}		
		.website-footer .widget-content {

		}
		.website-footer a {
		color:#fcfcfc;
		}
		.website-footer a:visited {
		color: $(link.visited.color);
		}
		.website-footer a:hover {
		color:$(link.hover.color);
		}
		.website-copyright {
		background: rgba(0,0,0,0.20);
		text-align: center;
		padding:20px;
		margin:auto;
		color:#fff;
		}
		.website-copyright i {
		color : #b51b54
		}

		/**
		*
		* css-footer-responsive
		*
		*/

		@media only screen and (min-width: 320px) {
		.website-footer-widget .website-footer {
		width:100%;
		float:none;
		}
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
		}
		@media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
		.website-footer-widget {
		padding:20px 0;
		}		
		.website-footer-widget .website-footer {
		width:30%;
		float:left;
		margin-left:20px;
		}		
		}


		/**
		*
		* css-pagination
		*
		*/

		.blog-pager {
		text-align:center;
		margin:0 20px 20px 0;
		}
		.blog-pager-newer-link {
		float:left;
		padding:10px;
		border: 1px solid #333;
		}
		.blog-pager-older-link {
		float:right;
		padding:10px;
		border: 1px solid #333;
		}		 
		.blog-pager .home-link{
		display:inline-block;	
		padding:10px;
		border: 1px solid #333;		
		}		 


		/**
		*
		* css-random-post
		* rewrite with love
		*/

		.website-random-post {
		width:100%;
		}
		ul.website-random-post li {
		clear:both;
		overflow:hidden;
		padding:5px 0;
		}
		.website-random-post img {
		border: 1px solid #000;
		width:45px;
		height: 45px;
		}

		/* animasi jika show date aktif */
		.website-random-post-overlay-container {
		position:relative;
		float:left;
		margin-right:10px;
		}
		.website-random-post-overlay-container:hover .website-random-post-overlay, .website-random-post li:hover .website-random-post-overlay {
		bottom:0;
		height:100%;
		}
		.website-random-post-overlay {
		position: absolute;
		bottom:100%;
		left:0;
		right:0;
		background-color:#0089ff;
		overflow:hidden;
		width:100%;
		height:0;
		transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		}
		.website-random-post-date {
		white-space:nowrap;
		color:#fff;
		font-size:10px;
		position:absolute;
		overflow:hidden;
		top:50%;
		left:50%;
		transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
		-ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
		}	 	

		/**
		*
		* css-archive
		*
		*/

		.BlogArchive {

		}
		.BlogArchive ul {

		}
		.BlogArchive li {
		position:relative;
		padding:5px 0 5px 20px;
		}
		.BlogArchive li:before {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		left:0;
		font-family:fontawesome;
		content:'\f09e';
		padding:7px 0;
		}
		.BlogArchive .post-count {
		margin:0 0 0 5px;
		padding:2px 4px;
		position:relative;
		bottom:2px;
		border: 1px solid;
		font-size:10px;		
		} 

		/**
		*
		* css-label-list
		* 
		*/

		.list-label-widget-content {

		}
		.list-label-widget-content ul {

		}
		.list-label-widget-content li {
		position:relative;
		padding:5px 0 5px 20px;
		}
		.list-label-widget-content li:before {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		left:0;
		font-family:fontawesome;
		content:'\f292';
		padding:7px 0;
		}		 

		/**
		*
		* css-label-cloud
		*
		*/

		.cloud-label-widget-content {

		}
		.cloud-label-widget-content .label-size {
		float:left;
		position:relative;
		padding:2px 0 2px 20px;
		width:calc(50% - 20px);
		height:20px;
		overflow:hidden;
		}
		.cloud-label-widget-content .label-size:before {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		left:0;
		font-family:fontawesome;
		content:'\f292';
		padding:6px 0;
		font-
		}	
		.cloud-label-widget-content .label-size a{
		height:18px;
		display:inline-block;
		overflow:hidden;
		font-size:14px
		}		
		.cloud-label-widget-content .label-count {
		margin:0 0 0 5px;
		padding:0px 4px;
		border: 1px solid;
		font-size:10px;	
		}			 

		/**
		*
		* css-popular-post
		*
		*/

		.PopularPosts {
		}
		.PopularPosts article {
		margin-bottom:10px;
		}
		.PopularPosts article {
		position:relative;
		height:100px;
		float:left;
		width:calc(50% - 20px);
		margin: 0 17px 10px 0;
		border:1px solid #333;
		}
		.PopularPosts article .post-snippet {
		display:none;
		}
		.PopularPosts article .post-title {
		position:absolute;
		left:0;
		bottom:0;
		text-align:center;
		padding:10px;
		background: rgba(25, 28, 39, 0.9);
		z-index:1;
		font-size:10px;
		}		
		.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail {
		float:none;
		padding:0;
		}						
		.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail a, 
		.PopularPosts article .item-thumbnail img  {
		width:100%;
		height:100%;
		max-width:300px;		
		-webkit-transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		transition: .3s ease-in-out;
		}
		.PopularPosts article:hover .item-thumbnail img {
		-webkit-transform: scale(1.3);
		transform: scale(1.3);
		}	
		.PopularPosts article:before {
		font-family:fontawesome;
		content: '\f005';
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		left:0;
		text-align:center;
		padding:10px;
		z-index:1;
		width:25px;
		color:#ffc107;
		}			

		/**
		*
		* css-breadcrumbs
		* made with love
		*/

		.website-breadcrumbs {
		padding:15px 5px 15px 20px;
		background:#f5f5f5;
		margin:0 25px 0 0;
		border-bottom:2px solid #b7b7b7;
		margin-bottom:5px;
		}
		.website-breadcrumbs-home {

		}
		.website-breadcrumbs-label {

		}

		/**
		*
		* css-search
		*
		*/

		.BlogSearch {
		box-shadow:none !important;
		background:none !important;		 
		}
		.BlogSearch .title{
		display:none;
		}
		.BlogSearch .widget-content {
		padding:0;
		border:none;
		}
		.BlogSearch .search-input input{
		height:44px;
		width:100%;
		padding:0 10px;
		}
		.BlogSearch .search-action {
		position:absolute;
		top:0;
		right:0;
		height:50px;
		background:#ffc107;
		border:none;
		}
		.BlogSearch form {
		position:relative
		}		

		/**
		*
		* css-message
		*
		*/

		.website-message {
		color:$(link.color);
		text-align:center;
		padding:20px;
		}

'+f[parseInt(w,10)]+"<br/>"+h+"<br/>"+p+"</span></div></div></div>"),document.write('<a href="'+r+'" target="_top">'+n+' <i class="fa fa-thumbs-o-up" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>')),"content"in i)var 			if ((screen.width>=768)) {
			function resizeheaderscroll(){
			const distanceY = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop,
			shrinkOn = 100,
			headerEl = document.getElementById('website-header');

			if (distanceY > shrinkOn) {
			headerEl.classList.add("small");
			}else {
			headerEl.classList.remove("small");
			}
			}
			window.addEventListener('scroll', resizeheaderscroll);
			}		
				

		
			function website_content_move(content,destination){
			var fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
			fragment.appendChild(document.getElementById(content));
			document.getElementById(destination).appendChild(fragment);
			}
			function check_element(id){
			var check=0;
			if (document.getElementById(id)) {
			check=1;
			}else {
			check=0;
			}
			return check;
			}		
		   

		
			//
			/**
			*
			* js-cut-string
			* https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3414916/display-only-10-characters-of-a-long-string
			* https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18481022/innerhtml-with-getelementbyclassname-doesnt-work
			*/
			function cut_string(selector,name,length) {
			var maxlength = length;
			if(selector == 'id') {					
			var text= document.getElementById(name).innerHTML;
			if(text.length>maxlength){
			var strcut = "";
			for(i = 0; i < maxlength; i++ ){
			strcut += text[i];
			}
			document.getElementById(name).innerHTML = strcut + "...";
			}
			}
			if(selector == 'class') {
			var text= document.getElementsByClassName(name)[0].innerHTML;
			if(text.length>maxlength){
			var strcut = "";
			for(i = 0; i < maxlength; i++ ){
			strcut += text[i];
			}
			document.getElementsByClassName(name)[0].innerHTML = strcut + "...";
			}					
			}
			}	
			//cut_string('class','item-snippet',100);

false}function artikelterkait(){var v=new Array(0);var w=new Array(0);var x=new Array(0);var A=new Array(0);for(var u=0;u<relurls.length;u++){if(!contains(v,relurls[u])){v.length+=1;v[v.length-1]=relurls[u];w.length+=1;w[w.length-1]=reljudul[u];x.length+=1;x[x.length-1]=relcuplikan[u];A.length+=1;A[A.length-1]=relgambar[u]}}reljudul=w;relurls=v;relcuplikan=x;relgambar=A;for(var u=0;u<reljudul.length;u++){var B=Math.floor((reljudul.length-1)*Math.random());var i=reljudul[u];var s=relurls[u];var y=relcuplikan[u];var C=relgambar[u];reljudul[u]=reljudul[B];relurls[u]=relurls[B];relcuplikan[u]=relcuplikan[B];relgambar[u]=relgambar[B];reljudul[B]=i;relurls[B]=s;relcuplikan[B]=y;relgambar[B]=C}var r=0;var 															/**
															*
															* website thumbnail
															* rewrite with love
															*/

															//
															function website_thumbnail(thumbnail_url, thumbnail_title){
															var width = 400;
															var height = 250;
															var error = "<!--Can't find substitution for tag [post.thumbnailUrl]-->";
															thumbnail_ok = '<figure><img src="'+thumbnail_url.replace('/s72-c/', '/w'+width+'-h'+height+'-c/')+'" title="'+thumbnail_title+'" alt="'+thumbnail_title+'" /></figure>';
															thumbnail_error = '<figure><img src="//3.bp.blogspot.com/-2Pza1bABuKM/WXO62nKYjTI/AAAAAAAAAB8/sKjsrvcMxxE3dphWH10F7WLZzReyhSTfwCPcBGAYYCw/w'+width+'-h'+height+'-c/computer-flat-icon.png" title="'+thumbnail_title+'" alt="'+thumbnail_title+'"/></figure>';
															if (thumbnail_title!="" && thumbnail_url!=error)
															return thumbnail_ok; 
															else
															return thumbnail_error; 

															}
															//
														
														
															/**
															*
															* js-remove-html-tag
															*
															*/
															//
															function website_removeHTML(id, long) {
															div = document.getElementById(id);
															string = div.innerHTML;
															if (string.indexOf("<") != -1) {
															var s = string.split("<");
															for (var i=0; i<s.length;i++){
															if (s[i].indexOf(">") != -1) {
															s[i] = s[i].substring(s[i].indexOf(">")+1, s[i].length);
															}
															} 
															string = s.join("");
															}
															long = (long < string.length-1) ? long : string.length-2;
															while(string.charAt(long-1) != ' ' && string.indexOf(' ', long) != -1) long++;
															string = string.substring(0, long-1);
															return div.innerHTML=string+'...';
															}		
															//
														

																			
													
													
	
														
															
																document.write(website_thumbnail("",""));
